extension.description: Hey, I'm Arcade Matt and welcome to my arcade channel! I like to go out to arcades and play the claw machine, some people also call them a skill crane or crane game. I even show tips and tricks on how to win at them! I don't use any cheat or hack, just skill to come out a winner! I enjoy the coin pusher for quarters and bonus coin wins! I'm also a fan of arcade ticket games, found at places like Dave and Busters, Round One, and Tilt arcades. I love to win the arcade jackpot for tons of tickets! I then use my tickets to get awesome prizes like a GoPro, Nintendo Consoles, and more! Jackpot ticket games I enjoy playing are Slam a Winner, Dizzy Chicken, Tower of Tickets, Monster Drop, Pop the Lock, among others! Many of these games are 100% skill! I also enjoy prize games like Stacker, Sega Keymaster, Winner's Cube, where you can win high end prizes like an Ipad, Xbox, PS4, or even money like a $100 bill! I've also branched out to carnival games and mini golf! SUB TODAY!
extension.disclaimer: The author of this add-on is in no way affiliated with Arcade Matt Youtuber
